synopsis.text:
Tsubame Koyasu, a popular upperclassman who helps to instill a new confidence in him. Miko Iino, the newest student council member, grows closer to the rule-breaking Ishigami while striving to overcome her own authoritarian moral code. As love further blooms at Shuchiin Academy, the student council officers drag their outsider friends into increasingly comedic conflicts.

In the third season of "Kaguya-sama: Love is War - Ultra Romantic", the battle of wits and love between Kaguya Shinomiya and Miyuki Shirogane continues! As the student council members of Shuchiin Academy navigate through everyday situations, they must also strategize to make the other confess their feelings first. With Miko Iino joining the team, the group becomes more dynamic and well-rehearsed. From deciding who's the strongest in the student council to writing sweet messages via "Line", they find themselves in various hilarious predicaments. Meanwhile, Yuu Ishigami struggles with his unrequited love for Tsubame Koyasu, and Kaguya faces the challenges of her new smartphone and social media. As the gods laugh at their plans, the members of the student council continue their cunning war of love. Will they finally confess their true feelings to each other, or will their pride continue to get in the way? Only time will tell in this romantic comedy anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
